HwTheme.title: Kasuga Imagination
HwTheme.author: 华为官方主题设计团队
HwTheme.designer: 华为官方主题设计团队
HwTheme.briefinfo-en: Although all the journeys in Spring have been overshadowed during the hibernation period. But fortunately, Imagine makes people full, action makes people happy, click on the button below, punch in the stickers of spring day together, and feel the freshness of spring~
HwTheme.briefinfo-cn: 虽然春日的所有旅途都曾在冬眠期黯然失色沉睡不醒。但是好在，畅想让人充盈，行动使人愉悦，点击下方按钮，一起打卡春日畅想贴纸，感受春意盎然吧～
